docs.text: table-reader plugin This site serves as an example of how to use the table-reader plugin. read_csv The table below was inserted using the {{ read_csv('tables/basic_table.csv') }} tag: a b 40 73 50 52 531456 80 name table1 read_excel The table below was inserted using the {{ read_excel('tables/excel_table.xlsx') }} tag: a b 40 73 50 52 531456 8 Reading xlsx files You might get a XLRDError('Excel xlsx file; not supported',) error on linux systems. That's because xlrd does not support .xlsx files ( stackoverflow post ). Instead, install openpyxl and use: {{ read_excel('tables/excel_table.xlsx', engine='openpyxl') }} read_fwf The table below was inserted using the {{ read_fwf('tables/fixedwidth_table.txt') }} tag: Brand Price Honda Civic 22000 Toyota Corolla 25000 Ford Focus 27000 Audi A4 35000
